requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher (64-bit) Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD A10 with 4 physical cores
  • Graphics: Geforce GT 720 or AMD Radeon HD 7870 with at least 2 GB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Running the Dedicated Server and Client on the same computer will double ram requirements. Also future releases may require more hard drive space.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher (64-bit) Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Ryzen with 6 physical cores
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon 570 with at least 4GB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Running the Dedicated Server and Client on the same computer will double ram requirements. Also future releases may require more hard drive space.

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.1 ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512mb VRAM

  • Storage: 300 MB MB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2GHz or AMD Dual-Core 2GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 400 series or AMD Radeon HD 6000 series, 2GB Video Card (Minimum Shader Model 5.0)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: If you want to try playing on lower end systems, check the setup.ini and Reshade files in the game files.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core 3GHz or AMD Quad-Core 3GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB AMD or 4 GB NVIDIA GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: Would recommend something like this with an SSD for the optimal experience.

requirements_en.minimum:

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible, 256 MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Even slower systems run the game.

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 or later
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 60 MB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD 620, AMD Radeon RX Vega 10 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes. And some speakers too!
  • Additional Notes: Intended for low quality settings and 720p resolution. Gamepads strongly recommended.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX Vega 8, Nvidia GeForce MX150 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Definitely. With at least two good speakers, because we have STEREO sound here!
  • Additional Notes: Intended for highest quality settings and 1080p resolution. Gamepads strongly recommended.
